transArray.content: The location of the hotel is very advantageous. It is very safe to stay. It is clean, tidy and sanitary. The service attitude is very good. It is worth recommending.

Hello dear guests! Thank you for staying at Orange Beijing Wukesong Hotel and sharing your stay experience with us. As you said, the hotel is located in the Badili Automobile Park on the West 4th Ring Road, only a five-minute walk from Haidian 5th Road Ju Station on Metro Line 6. , the surrounding transportation network extends in all directions. It is a pleasure to see your positive recognition and recognition of our service attitude. When you check in next time, if you have any questions about the room, you can contact our front desk partners at any time. We are at your side 24 hours a day. We look forward to your visit again and wish you a happy life!
